channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell -- Unity
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell -- Unity

item.title: CVE-2021-21547|2024-09-16T18:34:33.545Z -- dell -- unity
item.description: Dell EMC Unity, UnityVSA, and Unity XT versions prior to 5.0.7.0.5.008 contain a plain-text password storage vulnerability when the Dell Upgrade Readiness Utility is run on the system. The credentials of the Unisphere Administrator are stored in plain text. A local malicious user with high privileges may use the exposed password to gain access with the privileges of the compromised user.
